mapper.insert: INSERT INTO performance (pf_title, pf_content, pf_agerating, pf_date, pf_bookingmethod, pf_production, pf_location, pf_runningtime, pf_price, pf_genre, pf_thumbnail, user_id) VALUES (#{pfTitle}, #{pfContent}, #{pfAgerating}, #{pfDate}, #{pfBookingmethod}, #{pfProduction}, #{pfLocation}, #{pfRunningtime}, #{pfPrice}, #{pfGenre}, #{pfThumbnail}, #{userId},)
mapper.update: UPDATE performance SET pf_title = #{pfTitle}, pf_content = #{pfContent}, pf_agerating = #{pfAgerating}, pf_date = #{pfDate}, pf_bookingmethod = #{pfBookingmethod}, pf_production = #{pfProduction}, pf_location = #{pfLocation}, pf_runningtime = #{pfRunningtime}, pf_price = #{pfPrice}, pf_genre = #{pfGenre}, pf_thumbnail = #{pfThumbnail} WHERE pf_id = #{pfId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE performance SET pf_status = 'deleted' WHERE performance_id = #{performanceId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.pf_title, p.pf_location, CASE WHEN p.pf_price = 0 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS isPrice, p.pf_date, p.pf_thumbnail, COALESCE(v.view_count, 0) AS view_count FROM performance p LEFT JOIN (SELECT pf_id, COUNT(view_id) AS view_count FROM VIEW WHERE pf_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY pf_id) v ON p.pf_id = v.pf_id WHERE pf_status = 'active'

SELECT p.pf_title, p.pf_location, CASE WHEN p.pf_price = 0 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS isPrice, p.pf_date, p.pf_thumbnail, COALESCE(v.view_count, 0) AS viewCount FROM performance p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pf_id, COUNT(*) AS view_count FROM view GROUP BY pf_id ) v ON p.pf_id = v.pf_id WHERE p.pf_status = 'active' ORDER BY COALESCE(viewCount, 0) DESC LIMIT 6
